data.message: Ι have a suggestion. To allow to give to our personal profile any nickname we want and keep our personal Name and Last name ONLY INSIDE, to about section. If someone want to see it he/she can go to About to read it.

replies.message: Hi, Vaios. We truly appreciate feedback from the Facebook community, and we use it to help inform our decisions. Please keep sharing your feedback and we'll keep working hard to improve the Facebook experience for everyone. -Rhea
They won't do that because they are liberal run and want transparency.

there is no human out there in Facebook's support team. they never reply you. they don't care about your frustration. seriously Facebook offers worst customer support on this planet. Trying to contact Facebook support for last 4 days but no one is there to reply me. I've created so many tickets, reports but no reply from Facebook.
